most_active_tickets.title: Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
Pieces OS is not running even after several attempts and reinstallation
Pieces OS not running or responding after latest tahoe beta update

common_issues.title: Copilot struggles with workstream activities and data retrieval
common_issues.description: Users report Copilot failing to locate and utilize workstream activities, especially when selecting multiple activities or specific time ranges.  The issue appears to affect daily work report generation and activity updates.  One user mentioned success when using the 'start copilot chat' within a single activity.  Further investigation is needed to determine the root cause and potential solutions.

related_issues.title: Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
related_issues.text:
Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Last week, I used the copilot for creating report of the day's work logs.
It worked properly but I doesn't work since yesterday(I don't know the issue starts from yesterday but I detected it on yesterday)

Copliot can't find the activities in workstream and It doesn't care about time range selection.

It works when using 'start copilot chat' button in specific activity, but can't use with multiple activities.

I hope to use it for creating daily work report everyday.

- requested today's daily work report
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fb4e4763-8866-432f-9ce5-12b4a0b4eead)
- requested today's daily work report using english
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e11a9ed2-2714-4f2b-8d6b-c3272dccafbd)
- showing that I have acitivities
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c27034e-0640-45b5-8da8-83e715b95e5e)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Performance Issues and Failure to Launch
common_issues.description: Users report Pieces OS performance degradation in VS Code after multiple Copilot messages, leading to slow UI and high resource usage.  Others report Pieces OS failing to launch on Windows and macOS after updates or reinstallation.  Suggested solutions include checking system resources, reinstalling Pieces OS, and verifying compatibility with VS Code extensions and OS versions.

related_issues.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
related_issues.text:
UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, VS Code, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After sending several messages to Pieces Copilot in the extension for VS Code, there is a significant performance drop to the program which leads to the app eventually becoming extremely slow and difficult to use when pressing buttons, using keyboard input, and the speed of which a LLM responds. CPU usage and RAM usage also spikes when this occurs.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS not running after latest update
common_issues.description: Users are reporting Pieces OS failing to start after the latest Tahoe beta update on macOS and Windows.  One user on macOS also reported login issues with verification codes not arriving. Reinstallation did not resolve the startup issue on Windows. Further investigation is needed into the update's impact on startup and login processes.

related_issues.title: Can't login/authentication message won't arrive
related_issues.text:
Can't login/authentication message won't arrive
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I haven't been online a lot because of personal issues. Yesterday I restarted pieces for the first time in weeks, and it said I needed to sign in before I can continue.
First the sign in link wouldn't work. Then I noticed there was a Pieces OS update too. After I clicked that update I got back to the same screen and the link would work.
So I entered my mail address and it said I should get a verification code, which never arrived. So I tried again later and still nothing happened. I decided to let it rest until today and try it again, but still the same result.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and address the root cause of Copilot's failure to utilize workstream activities, especially for multiple activities and specific time ranges.
Prioritize performance improvements for Pieces OS in VS Code after multiple Copilot messages, focusing on UI responsiveness and resource usage.
Investigate and resolve the Pieces OS startup failures on macOS and Windows after the latest Tahoe beta update.
Address the login issue on macOS where verification codes are not arriving.
Improve communication with users regarding known issues and expected resolution timelines.
